summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the settlement of two actions pending in the Superior Court against the City of Seattle, entitled and numbered as follows: Seattle Tent & Awning Company vs. the City of Seattle, Western Union Telegraph Company and Seattle Gas Company, Cause No. 243688; and Scott-McGeorge Building Company c. the same, Cause No. 243687; and appropriating moneys from the Water Fund therefor.
